description:
Crunching numbers in a spreadsheet is only daunting until you know what youâ€™re doing. Our 3-hour class teaches you the essentials of not just beginning-level Excel, but some of the more advanced features that are essential to working with your numbers.

This class is perfect on-the-job training.

We will cover:

  1. Moving around in a spreadsheet
  2. Entering Data
  3. AutoFill Handle
  4. Formulas
  5. Functions
  6. Relative & Absolute Cell References
  7. Formatting
  8. Conditional Formatting
  9. Sparklines
  10. Charts
  11. Data Tables for filtering
  12. Pivot Tables
  13. Tracing Dependencies
  14. Printing tips
title: Learn Excel in 3 Hours Flat
